授業目的: This course familiarizes students to major theories on the study of culture and society as preparation for graduation thesis writing.
到達目標: After taking this course, students will have gained knowledge of important theories pertaining to the study of culture and society.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

第1回:
All classes are face-to-face.
Please refer to section below.
トピック.授業計画1: In the first semester, we will discuss Ha-Joon Chang's "Bad Samaritans." In the second semester, Amartya Sen's "Identity and Violence." Both books are available for free download from the internet. Students should get a copy themselves.
トピック.授業外学習2: Weekly essay of 350 words (100 summary, 250 comments). A 1500-word book review essay at the end of each semester.
